# unit

**Instance Property**

The increment of time for the subscription period.

## Declaration

```swift
let unit: Product.SubscriptionPeriod.Unit
```

## Discussion

The units used to specify a subscription period include day, week, month, and year, as defined in [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionPeriod/Unit-swift.enum].

To calculate the duration of one subscription period, multiply the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionPeriod/unit-swift.property] by the number of units ([doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionPeriod/value]).

## Getting the subscription period

- **value**: The number of period units.
- **Product.SubscriptionPeriod.Unit**: Units of time that describe subscription periods.
